Name: Thriller
Description: A film with a plot driven by exciting events.

Name: Horror
Description: Createrd to invoke fear, usually through either superntaural events or psychological disturbance.

Name: Comedy
Description: Focused on making the audience laugh by relying on satire,absurdity and socially odd situations and behavior.

Name: Action
Description: A movie with a multitude of explosive, fast moving events most commonly depicting sorts of battles.
